nodes.text: The Vriichon brothers were Ranat spice dealers. At one point, the siblings bought the cantina of Mos Eisley, Tatooine, which they turned into a spice den. Eventually, they sold the den to a Wookiee named Chalmun, who turned it into a bar again. Soon after the sale, the brothers vanished, perhaps out of fear that Chalmun would discover the many corpses they had buried in the basement.
